fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You pull out a random crystal each night from the following:
> **Scorch Crystal:** Your target's defense is reduced to Vulnerable for two nights, and they take two less votes to hang the next day.
> **Impact Crystal:** Deal a Basic attack to the target.
> **Slash Crystal:** Whoever your target visits will Bleed. If the target has less than Powerful defense upon application and is not healed the next night, they will die. They will die even if they gain Powerful defense that night. Only affects the first two people the target visits. The application is an indirect attack.
> **Nature Crystal:** Your target gains roleblock, redirect, control, and prevention immunity for the night.
> **Arcane Crystal:** Your target is Astral for the night and will appear to be a role of your choice upon investigation or death tonight.
> **Toxic Crystal:** Your target is healed (gains Powerful defense) for that night, and all attackers are dealt a Powerful attack.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- With the Necronomicon, you choose which crystals you use and you can use two each night.
- If you are attacked by a role with Vigilante in the name, you will not die and instead the attacker will join the Coven.
